price: que levantaba a la gente como si fueran troncos de palmeras arrancados de raíz.
arabic: تَنزِعُ ٱلنَّاسَ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٖ مُّنقَعِرٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: tanziʿu al-nāsa ka-annahum aʿjāzu nakhlin munqaʿirin
